name: Project AXRIA
short_description:
AXRIA is a series of Video games independently created and developed by Angus Beer (James Leonardo). 
Angus' brainchild, Sarah Kinzi plays the role as the protagonist, with a typical plot of saving planet AXRIA from Dr. Scarfire. 

Before the video games, AXRIA (Back then known as 'The FEAR of DEATH') had been a series of comics and animations. Also made by Angus.

So far there has been AXRIA Retro World and the upcoming Retro World 2. 
Future plans involve releasing other AXRIA games that had previously been unreleased or cancelled due to lack of quality or completion. (These games date to 2009-2011)
summary: A series of independent Video games
